mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FUNDITEM
mapper.update: UPDATE OWNITEM SET OVALUE = OVALUE-#{ovalue} WHERE O_MNO=#{o_mno} AND O_INO=#{o_ino}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY WHERE DH_MNO_TAKE = #{mno} AND DHSTATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, DH_NICK_GIVE, DHVALUETYPE, DHVALUE, SUM, CNT, DHSTARTDATE FROM (SELECT M.MNICK AS DH_NICK_GIVE, DH.DHVALUETYPE, DH.DHVALUE, SUM(DH.DHVALUE) AS SUM, MAX(DHD.DHDCOUNT) AS CNT, DH.DHSTARTDATE FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, DIRECTFUNDHISTORYDETAIL DHD, MEMBER M WHERE DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = M.MNO AND DH.DHNO = DHD.DHD_DHNO AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = #{mno} AND DHSTATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MNICK, DH.DHVALUETYPE, DHD.DHD_DHNO, DH.DHSTARTDATE, DH.DHVALUE)

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, DD_NAME, DDVALUE, DDATE, DLINK FROM (SELECT F.INAME AS DD_NAME, DD.DDVALUE, D.DDATE, D.DLINK FROM DELIVERYDETAIL DD, FUNDITEM F, DELIVERY D WHERE DD.DD_INO = F.INO AND DD.DD_DNO = D.DNO AND D.D_MNO = #{mno} ORDER BY D.DDATE DESC)
SELECT MPR, MPRNEW FROM MEMBER WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND MSTATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING WHERE FWRITER = #{mno} AND FTYPE = 'ITEM'

SELECT DISTINCT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE, FCONTENT, FITEMNAME, FSTARTDATE, FENDDATE, FSTATUS FROM (SELECT DISTINCT F.FNO, F.FTITLE, F.FCONTENT, (SELECT LISTAGG(CAST(FI2.INAME as varchar2(50)),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY FD2.FD_FNO) FROM FUNDINGDETAIL FD2 JOIN FUNDITEM FI2 ON(FI2.INO = FD2.FD_INO) WHERE F.FNO = FD2.FD_FNO GROUP BY FD2.FD_FNO) AS FITEMNAME, F.FSTARTDATE, F.FENDDATE, F.FSTATUS FROM FUNDING F JOIN FUNDINGDETAIL FD ON(F.FNO=FD.FD_FNO) JOIN FUNDITEM FI ON(FD.FD_INO=FI.INO) WHERE F.FWRITER = #{mno} AND FTYPE = 'ITEM' ORDER BY FNO DESC) ORDER BY FNO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDING WHERE FWRITER = #{mno} AND FTYPE = 'MONEY'

SELECT DISTINCT ROWNUM RNUM, FNO, FTITLE, FCONTENT, FVALUE, FSTARTDATE, FENDDATE, FSTATUS FROM (SELECT FNO, FTITLE, FCONTENT, FVALUE, FSTARTDATE, FENDDATE, FSTATUS FROM FUNDING WHERE FWRITER = #{mno} AND FTYPE = 'MONEY' ORDER BY FNO DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE QWRITER = 'H' AND Q_MNO = #{mno}
SELECT DISTINCT ROWNUM RNUM, QNO, QTITLE, QCONTENT, QDATE, QANSWER FROM (SELECT QNO, QTITLE, QCONTENT, QDATE, QANSWER FROM QNA WHERE QWRITER = 'H' AND Q_MNO = #{mno} ORDER BY QDATE DESC )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA VALUES(SEQ_Q_NO.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, NULL, 'H', #{q_mno})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MNICK, MNO FROM DIRECTFUNDHISTORY DH, MEMBER M WHERE DH.DH_MNO_GIVE = M.MNO AND DH.DH_MNO_TAKE = #{mno} AND DH.DHSTATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY M.MNICK, M.MNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTER VALUES (SEQ_LE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{leMnoTake}, #{leMnoGive}, #{leTitle}, #{leContent}, SYSDATE, 1, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(ADATE+170))AS CHANGESTART, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(ADATE+184))AS FINISHDATE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE A_MNO = #{mno} AND ADOCTYPE = 1 AND ASTATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ADATE, TO_DATE(ADATE+184) AS DDAY,(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(ADATE+184))AS FINISHDATE, ACHANGENAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE A_MNO = #{mno} AND ADOCTYPE = 1
